Jason sat there, rubbing his sore gut, thinking about how the Frat brothers’ cheers had roared louder as he undid his pants. Nothing pleased them more than to see Jason growing a lot. Jason loved his gut, the tightness, and even the aching, but tonight had been a night that stretched his limits.

He felt impossibly full and heavy. He belched even louder as he gesticulated to stop Ryan from bringing over more food. Unwaveringly Ryan approached Jason with another beer and a slice of cake. Ryan was Jason’s best friend, they had each joined the fraternity to gain some respect, but Ryan had since turned into a delivery boy for the fraternity.

Ryan, as a newcomer, was supposed to also be condemned to Jason’s food-filled fate - but he had managed to get out of the ritual by telling the frat Jason’s favorite foods and drinks - thus pleasing the fraternity, and diverting attention from himself.

And, as Ryan set the open beer down next to Jason, he laughed. Jason was angry that he had been sold out by Ryan but he did enjoy the food. But at the time he half-mindedly regretted all the food he had just eaten; after this he would probably never fit into these pants again, but that's a price he has to pay, he figured, for popularity and respect.

Ryan smiled, “Wow Jason, you sure did eat a lot tonight."

Jason’s belly was huge and its tenderness left him practically immobile; he was in no mood to have a chat with Ryan. “Yeah (burp) and I don’t need you to get me more food……(burp)……” Jason looked at the slice of cake.

“Oh come on Jason,” Ryan said in a happy but devilish voice. “It’s merely a congratulatory gift!” He smiled again and cocked his head back.

Jason lifts his shirt up and glances at his stomach, it’s tight and round, it rests on his lap. “Just shut up and go…..(BURP)”

Ryan saw that Jason wasn’t in a good mood and stepped out quietly. He knew when to keep his mouth shut.

Jason leaned forward, clutching his stomach, and looked at the beer with unwavering eyes. He took up the bottle and guzzled it down, slowly and surely. He felt every drop hit the bottom of his stomach like a bomb. He continued to finish off the slice of cake, something in his mind told him to shut up and eat it. Something told him, despite his aching belly, just to buckle up and suck up.

Jason ate the cake and finished the beer, alone. He finished it and leaned back dosing off into a deep sleep, letting all the food settle, right into fat.

The pressure on his stomach had eased enough to make moving around a bit easier, if not quite effortless, so Jason slowly rose and returned to his room, taking each step of the staircase as slowly as a bride walking down the aisle. Once there, he went to his wardrobe to get what might pass as some gym gear. He had a tie-dye t-shirt that had fit a little baggier on him than his other tops did before he got to college, and some sweatpants that were a lot more forgiving than the cargo pants he was currently wearing.

Tugging the pants down his thicker thighs and struggling to wriggle free of his shirt felt like a workout alone; carrying the extra weight from his stuffed gut certainly added to the challenge. He took a moment to relax and enjoy feeling free of the constraints of clothes; he let out a big sigh and felt his belly relax and expand without being pinched by the waistband of his trousers. Getting into his new clothes was not without effort but was a little easier. Thanks to his growing gut, Jason was forced to wear the sweatpants lower than he was used to, and despite his growing size giving him less of the drawstring to work with, he managed to tie them on securely enough. The t-shirt felt tighter all over; his chest, shoulders and arms had clearly added more heft that he hadn't really considered before, but it was particularly tight around his belly. It wasn't exactly skin tight but it skimmed pretty tightly around his gut. It should be fine as long as he didn't move his arms above his head. Or off to the sides. Or let them swing too much when he walked.

With his clothes sorted, Jason scooped up his keys, wallet and phone before heading out. His head was buzzing with ideas but his first priority was to find a gym. He didn't want to use the one on campus or one too close to the frat house in case he saw any of his brothers there. It was one thing for them to take control of his stuffings but he didn't want them sabotaging his workouts, being a general distraction, or filling his head with any of their 'bro' science while he was working on his goals.

As he spent a little time walking, Jason realized that he made the right choice. Whilst he wasn't finding it difficult right now, he could feel the different way that his bigger body moved as he walked the streets and could imagine the extra effort it would take as he got bigger. Having some muscle to hold up and help lug around the fat was the smart thing to do.

As Jason turned a corner he hit a strip with a few shops on it but there were no signs of any gym. He was so busy back at the frat house deciding to make a change that he didn't even think of doing a search online for nearby gyms or leisure centres. Pulling out his phone, he did a quick search and found that there was one roughly ten minutes walk away. With the distance that he had already walked and its out of the way location, it seemed far enough away for him to be safe from his peers.

The ten minutes to get there felt like an age, as Jason kept checking street names and the map on his phone to make sure that he was headed the right way. As he reached the right road, he spotted the gym immediately. Because it seemed so out of the way, Jason assumed that it would be a bit pokey or basic, but the building was glass fronted and was surprisingly big; it looked very well maintained. The automatic doors hissed open as he approached and he could feel a blast of cool dry air hit him as he walked through. There were a couple of men chatting by the reception desk; a receptionist sat tapping on a keyboard as well. He wanted to get a better idea of the place before he talked to anyone, so he went up to a well organised noticeboard and had a read.

There was a lot to take in there as there seemed to be a lot to the gym. There were a variety of classes, from dance to self-defense, zumba to step aerobics, some of which were gender or age specific. There were pictures of a decent sized pool and – what Jason was really interested in – what seemed to be a pretty well equipped gym. There were a list of rates that seemed pretty reasonable and although there was nothing listed to say so, he wondered idly if there were any kind of student discount available. He thought it would be as simple as walking in, signing up and lifting weights but perhaps he should consider taking a much more structured approach. He didn't have any swimming trunks with him and he probably would need to buy some new ones that wouldn't cut off his blood supply, he thought as he absent-mindedly rubbed his belly. But other than swimming, most of the other options were open to him.

First he had to sign up. He checked the list of prices to see what would work best for him when another thought struck him. Although he had decided against it earlier, perhaps now would be the right time to call his friend Travis. He lived off campus and wasn't in the frat system so he wouldn't have the opportunity to blab to his frat brothers about Jason's plan, but more than that he was a gym goer and was taking a sports and nutrition course at college. Who better to scope the place out and tell him if it's any good than him? He might be able to help him out with a good workout plan on the cheap too. That said, Jason was feeling pretty impatient. Perhaps he should just talk to the receptionist, get signed up and check out the facilities.

After a short while...

"Your body, your choice." Travis said with a shrug. "So you're going to be my personal trainer, huh?" Jason said with a smile.

"Of course, I'll help you out however... unusual your goals. Just don't be offended if I don't take any before and after photos for a testimonial." Travis said, winking.

Jason stumbled across the idea of an eating contest by accident. He was trying to get some information on the most common causes of weight gain in fraternities and one of the hits was a video of an eating contest organised by one of the frats up country. He wasn't sure if it was a part of pledging, some form of punishment or if it had been organised to raise funds for the fraternity as there seemed to be a sizable crowd watching. All he knew as he sat back in his chair tracing his fingers gently around the sides of his bloated belly in small circles, is that he could squeeze in one or two of those pies that those lightweights in the video were eating. This was the bitterwsweet part of a stuffing; the moment when the pain subsided and he began to feel a bit more able to stretch out and breathe also reminded him how much he loved the feeling of being stuffed to his full, virile capacity. His time to be stuffed would come around again soon enough, perhaps even tomorrow if it was a particularly slow day for his brothers. Now it was time to turn his attention to the stuffing and fattening up of others...

Convincing his brothers to hold the contest would be easy, particularly if they could monetise it to raise some funds for the frat. He could do with coming up with a way to raise some money anyway, since a couple of his brothers had started 'joking' about making Jason pay for the privilege of being stuffed full of food almost to bursting point and then left groaning where he sat, like an abandoned toy. The only problem was in a frat that derived some kind of sadistic pleasure from stuffing one of it's own to the point of pain, making him pay for the pleasure of it was just the next logical step. So in addition to his studies, the stuffings that could happen at any given moment and his plans for revenge, he had to start factoring in the need to generate an income. Jason sighed to himself, shifting his weight awkwardly in his seat. That was a problem for another day.

Once the contest was organised, it was going to be hard to stop himself becoming the main attraction. He was sure that he could appeal to the competitive spirit of the jock brothers to take part, but just like in any other sport if there's a star player the other members of the team tend to fall in line behind them. He needed to suggest, organise and then not take part in the eating contest to make sure that his brothers fought it out to be top hog. If he wanted to really start to fatten them up he also had to make sure that there were plenty of practice sessions beforehand or multiple eating contests. A little bit of pudge wasn't enough for Jason; he had to make sure that at least a few of his brothers, preferably the ones that treated him the worst, gained a sizable belly in just the same way that he had - by being stuffed to their limits and just left where they were to just breathe shallowly and digest. Who knows? Maybe one or more of them might find out out that training for an eating contest is more fun than they thought...

Of course all of this would be a little easier if he had an ally or two helping him foster a sense of rivalry and manipulate their brothers into taking part in the contest and going BIG. There were a few guys who told their other brothers to cut it out when they acted particularly badly towards Jason and a couple more who he knew had their own beef with his main tormentors. If he could get them on side, applying pressure in just the right places and lending their voice to his, then it would make it a lot easier to really start to chub up some, or more, of his brothers than he originally thought.

Tonight was the time to plan, but even if it wasn't the night after a stuffing was no time for him to be pro-active as he was sluggish, unfocused and with his clothes riding up around his bloated belly was taken less seriously than usual. Tomorrow was the time to get things moving, but what was going to be his priority?

Bill T and Travis continue their dosing of Bill, and Lester, Jason is dosing Evan and Tyler, and Travis is surreptitiously dosing Jason while continuing their weekend feeding sessions. All five 'feedees' are rapidly showing the effects of the powerful appetite stimulant (which was designed to combat anorexia, not to be used on healthy, hungry regular guys...)

Bill, the biggest of the five, started out at 290 pounds. Just a month later, he is up to 325. The strongest weightlifter, Bill was always proud of his huge muscular body. But, even at six foot five, a gain of 35 pounds has seriously softened his body, but it doesn't bother him - yet. He has been bigger than this in the off-season.

The gut that had been just starting to protrude now stuck out a healthy two inches over his shorts, and he had a double chin now forming.

He shouldn't have been surprised, though - his huge gut looked like a balloon under his shirts, with a little bit of the bottom of his gut showing when one of his tighter shirts would ride up as he breathed. Tyler and Evan - still oblivious to their weight gain so far - manage to really ride Jason - taking every opportunity to mock their "Growing" boy. He had also started out quite thin at only 155 pounds on his six foot two body - so it was going to take a little while longer for him to show. Still, Travis could see his face starting to pudge up - and the beginning of development of a double chin. Evan was clearly controlling his appetite with his running - going out to the track earlier and for longer runs too. However - Jason knew it was only a matter of time.

Evan's first two months of gaining did not really show that much to the other guys - but Evan couldn't help but see the changes. He had gained forty pounds. Being six foot two tall helped - his now 195 pound frame was not that bad, as his regular running had kept the added weight from collecting all at his waist. The fact that he liked to wear oversize clothes made it all but impossible to really see the gain when he was dressed, but the mirror outside the shower told the tale.

His once lean muscular body, with veins that showed everywhere, was now covered in an undeniable coating of fat. His face was filling in and there seemed to be a hint of a double chin. However, the problem was his appetite and metabolism. With all the running he did, he had always been able to eat anything he wanted to and never gain weight. Now, not only was he gaining, but he was ravenous all day long. It seemed there was no way to satisfy his hunger, which came back quicker and stronger after every meal. So much so that Evan couldn't resist food, and chowed down with gusto at every possibility. He was on a "see food" diet - he ate whatever he saw. And he couldn't stop.

It also seemed that the fast metabolism that had prevented weight gain before had now failed. The weight was piling on. And the more "supplement" Jason fed him - the worse it got. He used to laugh at how big Jason's belly got after a feeding session with Travis - but now Evan was blowing up his own belly the same way. Once he started eating a meal, he couldn't stop until he was so full he felt like exploding - and his once trim stomach now pooched a couple of inches out in front of his shorts. And after a meal - it looked like he had swallowed a beach ball.

By the end of the third month, Jason had his wish - both Tyler and Evan were now too fat to deny it. Evan packed on 35 pounds - at 230 now, even the big clothes he wore couldn't hide his expanding gut. It started just under his softened pecs, and bowed out in an arch, almost a perfect ball gut in shape. Evan was now having problems running with the added weight bouncing around. But more important to Jason, everyone in the frat was now getting on both Tyler and Evan about their obvious expansion - the guys especially liked to 'pop' Evan in the gut every chance they got.

But even Jason's excitement about his success in revenge wasn't enough to allow him to forget what was happening to him. He still had not figured out that he was being dosed with the "supplement" too, in addition to Travis' constant force feeding. But he did know he was getting pretty big..

At 230 pounds, Evan was now on the verge of getting really fat. He had always been tall and thin, and his running kept his body in top shape. So much so that he did little other exercise - he had naturally tight abs and did no sit -ups or crunches. Now that he was rapidly gaining weight, much of the weight was gathering right at his mid-section. The gut started just below his softened pecs, and bowed out in a long arch in front of him and in all directions - meeting with a now healthy set of love-handles forming at his sides.

His tight jaw line was now gone - replaced with a sagging double chin and cherub-like cheeks. His dimples we now huge indentations. His classic good looks and chiseled features had now been replaced with a round pudgy look. All of his definition was gone.

Evan really despised the treatment he was getting from some of the frat guys. They would thump him in his obviously expanding belly every chance they got. Or else they would rub his belly like a Budha. Evan had never been fat in his life. He didn't know how it was happening now, all he knew was that he was unable to stop eating - the hunger was so strong, he just could not resist eating - more and more each day.
And.... Every day, he gained more and more weight. By the middle of the month, his weight was making it hard for him to do his running. His legs and feet were sore from the pounding with the extra weight - and his gut bouncing around ruined his form.

Worse yet - at the track, he became the poster boy for the fat guys. He tried to go when no one was there, but that was nearly impossible. The comments were hard for him to take. Then, at the end of the month, he twisted his foot by mistakenly running at the edge of the track. It swelled up like a balloon. He had no choice but to go to the infirmary, where they pronounced a bad sprain, showed him to wrap up the the ankle - and he couldn't run for a while.

Worse, they weighed him in at 265 pounds! He couldn't even think about being that big. But the Ball gut he had at the beginning of the month was now starting to sag. As it was, those big clothes he wore were now getting tight. There was no hiding the fat anymore. And now - he couldn't run.

How big was he going to get?

Bill may have been a few pounds heavier, but it sure didn't look like it. The double whammy of the supplement causing extreme hunger, and the force feeding Jason was getting every weekend from Travis was piling on the pounds. He didn't even fit into the Frat's Santa suit!

Originally, Jason had decided to go for 300 pounds, but now he was more than 50 pounds past that. And Travis was not letting him stop there. With his ballooning weight and huge, expanding appetite, Jason knew that something was wrong and he was determined to find out what. He suspected Travis, and started watching him.

It wasn't until the end of the month that he learned that Travis was using the "supplement" on him. He was furious, but he was also huge - he was fast approaching 400 pounds - though the only thing he knew was that he was over 350 pounds, as that was the max of the scale at the frat.

He really wanted to see Tyler and Evan pass the 300 pound mark, though, so he knew he couldn't make a big stink about the "supplement" . However - Travis was now in his sights. While feeding him, Travis always had a beer in his hand. Now, the beer would have an additional ingredient.

Evan was upset that Travis was forcing him to gain far more than he originally planned. He figured that he was gaining enough without extra "help" and Travis was really forcing him to eat on the weekends. Evan knew that it was too late to stop that - but he was going to take Travis with him.

But Travis could not escape all this eating untouched. His average height, broad body tended to pack on fat despite his gym workouts, but under the fat he carried a lot of muscle, like a fat football lineman. Like a lot of college linemen he was also steadily growing - just not at the rate that Jason was. Travis always managed to find great looking clothes that looked good on his expanding bulk.

But now, Jason had grown even bigger than Travis and he was moving in on Bill for the title of "largest" in the frat. Jason's problem was that all the guys that were being fattened had a pretty long head start on Travis.

Jason went back to the web page to order more of the "supplement" but this time also ordered an 'extra strength' version he would use on Travis. There was a warning included with this version - to follow directions and dosages - too much of the "supplement" could cause uncontrollable hunger and reduce metabolic rate enough to cause rapid weight gain that could continue for months after discontinuing the drug. That was just what Jason was looking for.

Jason gave Travis a triple dose of the drug each day for the first week. Travis was already complaining about hunger the second day, and by the fourth day he was eating everything in sight. Jason then added in phase two. He decided that he would force Travis to eat like Travis was doing to him. The combination of the hunger and that fact that Jason was now much bigger than him meant Travis was on his way. By the second week, Travis was so hungry that he was too busy eating to force feed Jason.
